caption:
“Pilgrimage is not distance but direction.”

Reflection:
The soul’s journey is measured not in miles, but in meaning — every turn toward truth is progress.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that pilgrimage is a posture, not a passport. We move nearer to God whenever our hearts align with His will.
